masterOminichannel.heading: Master omnichannel commerce - Sell everywhere you want with Commerce Layer

items.title: Omnichannel order management
items.des: Connect with multiple sales channels (ecommerce, selling websites, etc.) to manage orders on one single platform.

items.title: International ecommerce integration
items.des: Integrate hundreds of ecommerce platforms from abroad like Japan, America and Korea so sellers can effortlessly manage international orders.

items.title: Integration management
items.des: Integrate other system such as ERP, CRM, WMS to ensure smooth data flow and provide a comprehensive view of inventory levels, order status, customer information, and financial data.

items.title: Inventory management
items.des: Provide real-time stock visibility across warehouses, channels and locations. Allocate inventory to fulfill orders based on predefined rules, reducing the risk of stockouts and backorders.

items.title: Point of sale (POS) management
items.des: Not just online channels, Commerce Layer helps sellers manage their physical stores with POS system. Monitor every single product, customer data and employee.

items.title: Social commerce
items.des: Take control of order on social media sites like Facebook, Instagram with ease. Commerce Layer allows sellers to create order right on chat screen.

items.title: Order distribution
items.des: Distribute orders to the most suitable warehouse based on the locations and available items to save time and cost of delivery.

items.title: Inventory allocation
items.des: Allocate inventory level to each channel based on factors such as priority, location, availability, and customer requirements.

items.title: Multi-channel price management
des: Manage product prices across multiple platforms like Shopee, Lazada, Amazon, and instantly synchronize when there are price changes on these marketplaces.

items.title: Product management
items.des: Centralize product information to control on Commerce Layer. Update data just once and you get it updated on all sales channels.

items.title: Product crawler
items.des: Crawl product data from international ecommerces as Amazon, eBay, Rakuten, etc. to your selling website. No need to import data manually, everything is updated automatically in real-time.

items.title: Bundle, inventory bundle management
des: Sell products in bundles or combos for upsell and cross-sell across all your stores.
No need to pre-pack the products â€“ you can create bundles/combos at any time on IChiba Commerce Layer.
If you have excess stock, bundle them together and let IChiba handle the inventory tracking.

multiChannel.des: Unlock the potential of IChiba: beyond omnichannel order management, delve into our multichannel fulfillment service. Leave the logistics to us and concentrate on shaping your business strategy.

buildStoreFront.heading: StoreFront Layer IChiba OnePlatform
buildStoreFront.subHeading: Transform your digital ambitions into reality with IChiba online store builder. We create captivating online selling platforms, landing pages or applications that elevate brands, engage customers, and drive conversions.

system.heading: System integration
system.subHeading: Seamlessly integrate with sales channels, physical stores, social commerce & 3rd party system to deliver an all-inclusive management experience.

suitability.heading: Suitability
suitability.subHeading: IChiba Commerce Layer is capable of suiting multiple industries and company types, from SMEs to large corporations.

items.title: Omnichannel
items.des: Optimize order processing and distribution on omni-sale channels by tracking and recording data. Automatically post products on multiple ecommerces at the same time.

items.title: B2B & Wholesalers
items.des: Manage multiple suppliers, price lists, web stores and more with ease, and give businesses the flexibility they need to grow.

items.title: Direct to Customers (D2C)
items.des: Overcome challenges of single-handedly managing the hassle of sales channel expansion and distribution operations.

items.title: Ecommerce
items.des: Rapidly curate new services and deploy better online shopping experiences to take your business to the next level by making data-driven decisions.

items.title: Retail
items.des: Enhance efficiency, expand market reach, simplify management tasks, and provide a cohesive customer experience across sales channels, both online and offline.

items.title: Electronics
items.des: Commerce Layer is able to handle complex product assortments and rapid market changes of electronics industries by managing products in serial and imei.

items.title: Fashion & Beauty
items.des: Achieve full integration of inventory handling and exchange your eCommerce data with manufacturers and retailers for full supply chain visibility.

items.title: Dropshipping
items.des: Commerce Layer enhances dropshipping by providing robust order management and seamless multi-channel integration, all within a scalable, secure, and API-first commerce platform.

content: to add any sales channel or 3rd party system.

contactOverview.subHeading: Take control of your operations, optimize workflows, and watch your business thrive, no matter where you sell, on e-commerce, social media sites or physical stores. Don't wait, start transforming today!

heroSection.label: COMMERCE LAYER FEATURES
heroSection.heading: IChiba Commerce Layer Features
heroSection.subHeading: Take advantage of IChiba Commerce Layer - an extensive set of features to take your business to the next level. Digitalize your selling management is now not utopian anymore.

manageOrders.heading: Manage orders, no matter where you sell

multiMarket.title: Multi-market, Multi currency , Multi-language
contents: Centralize orders from multiple markets to one dashboard for seamless management.
Provide customized languages and currencies so business can effortlessly approach local customers.

omnichannel.title: Omnichannel order management
contents: Integrate all types of sales channels, both domestic and international: ecommerce, online selling websites, physical stores, social media sites.
Real-time syncing: Ensure all data remains up-to-date across all channels, providing a consistent and accurate overview of sales activities.

contents.subTitle: Sellers can manage product prices across multiple platforms like Shopee, Lazada, Amazon, selling websites, etc., from a single interface on Commerce Layer.
Any price changes on sales channels are automatically updated in Commerce Layer, and vice versa, saving sellers time and preventing errors in manually updating prices on each platform.
By synchronizing prices across platforms, sellers can avoid price discrepancies between marketplaces, maintain consistency, and optimize their price management processes.
Sellers can flexibly select products and create bundles upon receiving an order without needing to pre-pack, saving time and optimizing inventory management.
Selling product bundles is an effective way to quickly liquidate long-standing inventory, helping sellers improve cash flow.
Bundling products not only boosts purchase appeal but also helps sellers increase order value through cross-selling and upselling related items.

distribution.title: Distribution orders
contents: Identify warehouse near customers helps reduce the shipping zones and costs associated with shipping orders to faraway destinations.
Organize order fulfillment across channels to optimize delivery schedules and routes.
Offer network aggregation and inventory visibility for full control in multi-market.
If a warehouse can't adapt to the number of products, you can split the order for multiple warehouses to make deliveries.

reserve.title: Reserve inventory
contents: Lock a projected amount of inventory for future selling programs, as promotions or flash sale.
After the events, the left reserve inventory level will be back to available stock.

social.title: Social media sales integration
contents: Instant invoicing: Generate and send invoices directly through social media chat interfaces, facilitating immediate order confirmation.
Customer interaction tracking: Keep a log of customer interactions on social media to better understand their preferences and buying behavior.

flexible.title: Flexible third party integration
contents: Built with an API-first approach, ensuring easy integration with existing business systems like CRM, ERP, or financial software.
Develop custom connectors to link with new or niche platforms as your business requirements expand.
All integrations are secured with robust encryption and authentication protocols to protect your data.

productInformation.heading: Product information management
productInformation.title: Better product management, better selling performance
productInformation.subTitle: An all-in-one product information management (PIM) solution makes it faster & easier to create and deliver compelling product experiences.

unified.title: Unified product database
unified.content: Gather product data to monitor on one dashboard. Massively update information on sales channels, just once. Save time and enhance accuracy.

manage.title: Manage product data
manage.content: Customize product information to fit the requirements of different sales channels, including ecommerce, social media platforms, and selling websites.

advanced.title: Advanced data enrichment
advanced.content: Enhance product listings with high-quality images, videos, and detailed descriptions to improve engagement and sales.

localization.title: Localization & internationalization
localization.content: Manage product information in multiple languages, making it easy to cater to global markets. Automatically convert prices and measurements to local standards, simplifying international sales.

dataCrawler.heading: Product data crawler
contents: Easily pull product data from international e-commerce platforms like Amazon, Rakuten, Yahoo Shopping, etc., into your selling website or app.
Product images, descriptions, prices, and promotions are updated in real time.
Stay ahead of consumer shopping trends with the collection creation feature, displaying curated product data right on your website's homepage.

contents.title: Unified inventory
contents.content: View and manage in-store and online inventory simultaneously, ensuring consistency across all points of sale.

contents.title: Employee management
contents.content: Assign roles and permissions to store employees, and track performance directly through the POS system.

contents.title: Customer profiles
contents.content: Access detailed customer profiles at the point of sale, enabling personalized service and marketing opportunities.

contents.title: Product management
contents.content: Save all relevant information of items, allow staff to easily and quickly search the information, including the location, stock level, price, etc.

contactFeatures.subHeading: Unlock the full potential of your multi-channel operations with Commerce Layerâ€™s comprehensive feature set.
